Additional Scope Comments: ACF is a component agency within the Department of Health and Human Services.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure
Transfer Instructions: Transfer of records will be 15 years after employees tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: Limited legacy email exists for this agency, as traditional records management with print and file policy was enforced prior to capstone adaption.  Also, HHS has captured all SES/Political email accounts since Nov 2014. All legacy email in the employees mailbox at that time was retained.
